column5: Brown beat me up to the cottage. That was ok because he warmed the place up and shovelled all the snow before we got there. We decided not to pre fish, but sledded into a walleye lake.
Looks like you had a great time for a good cause.
Awesome to hear Chris!
A happy happy thread.  Well done fellas.
Nicely done and good on ya for donating the prize!!
That's awesome Chris !  Very thoughtful of you to donate your win to your cottage neighbour .
Nicely done and good on ya for donating the prize!! x2.

It was incredibly awesome that you won man, beautiful fish but even more so that you donated your winings to that family, cut above you are sir! Brown is a great guy & it was cool to meet your brother again. I had a fantastic day going 6/7

Glad to hear that Chris. Imagine the damage we could have done if Bain and Julian had made it out too.  For the record, I was 1 for 2, Brown and Kewley especially were putting numbers of fish on the ice.
Really wish I could have made it . A little competition is always fun ... Lol
That Bravo is a thing of beauty... the windburnt mug, not so much. lol. jk.  Chris Brock! You rock!!!
Thanks Bravo Buddie Bunk!  Imagine the  damage we could have done if we had Bunk and Sinker (Shane) on the team too. Total domination!

Oh yeah....team to beat for sure! Lol  I will be fishing with Mr. Bunk next weekend. Team yamalowrance we call ourselves lol....4 days in the bush off the grid coming up!!!  Its too bad conditions sucked so bad this year. I really wanted to hook up with ya on the ice this year. Fingers crossed its not over. I have 6 days off over easter weekend....  S.
Good man helping out a local family in need! Also good man catching the winning fish!
Awesome Chris.
Congrats Chris, looks like a fun day
Looks like a good time Chris and good on ya for donating your prize money to a family in need well done.  Cheers Mitch
From what I remember about years past with that derby, a six pounder is quite a trophy from that lake eh...must've felt great to get the win and even better to help out a local family in need.
Awesome dude! Looks like a blast, congrats on the win!

Yeah Joey, 140 guys and that was the only fish over the slot. The 2 previous years there was no fish entered over the slot.  It would have been even better if my young nephew fishing with us had caught it.
Nice work!!
Nice all around!  I could tell you were excited when ya txted me lol  Awesome chris!!!!  Good on ya too?
Your a good man Chris,great gift to your neighbors.Love your post always !!!!. .
